• Confirmed experience of leading / managing a team of hard-working data scientists

• Has already worked in a Research and Development set-up
• Comfortable working in global set-ups with diverse cross-geography teams and cultures
• Is both an ‘ideas’ person as well as a ‘hands-on’ person.
• Technology savvy – closely follows the latest developments in Data Science and technology
• Solid bases in Math and Probability
• Attitudinally dedicated, curious, and adventurous, willing to try out new things, explore.
